name: Sokoban (itch) (Enderto)
description:
A sokoban made with Tic-80 !

You are a golem made by a magician.

Your job is to push boxes where they can be teleported and support the current war.

SO PUSH !!!

you can add or change level, juste change it on the map but don't forget to change the lvl_max variable.

warning: there is no verification if the level is valid

I'm not an musician, so there is no music, sorry.
